improvement_list.improvement_desc: Potential division by zero error. Add check before division to ensure y is not zero.
Unreachable code path. The condition 'x % 2' will always be true after the first iteration, setting 'y' to 0 and leading to an eventual division by zero.

The variable y is always 4 after the loop except when it is set to 0.  The final value of z depends on whether this division by zero happens. Improve the logic to avoid potential division by zero error.
The loop variable 'i' is not used after the loop. Consider removing it if it is not used outside the loop, improve performance
The range(49) seems arbitrary. Consider using a more descriptive name for clarity and better understanding.
